## NativeLocationMap interface

NativeLocation与EluxLocation的转换

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NativeLocationMap 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [in(nativeLocation)](./vue-web.nativelocationmap.in.md) | NativeLocation不会直接在框架中流通和参与计算，它将在第一时间通过该方法转换为[EluxLocation](./vue-web.eluxlocation.md) |
|  [out(eluxLocation)](./vue-web.nativelocationmap.out.md) | 当需要通知原生路由时，通过该方法转换为原生路由描述 |
